db:abstract.db:para: Information about the commercial licensing of Qt.

db:article.db:para: Qt licensed under our commercial license agreement is appropriate for development of proprietary/commercial software where you do not want to share any source code with third parties or otherwise cannot comply with the terms of the GNU Lesser General Public License (LGPL) GNU LGPL version 3.
You can find more information on http://qt.io/licensing/.
